sect1.title: TMDb Plugin
sect1.para: The TMDb plugin retrieves information about movies from the TMDb online service, which is a community-maintained movie database. Its plugin ID is "grl-tmdb"
Before using this plugin, you should set the TMDB API Key with grl_config_set_api_key().
You may then use grl_source_resolve() to discover details about an existing GrlMediaItem.
This plugin does not support search via grl_source_search() or queries via grl_source_query().
